page.title: 08SCHOOL EVENTS
page.content: The school swimming gala was held on Wednesday,May15th.Llywelyn house won the cup.8 3/4th children visited Ostend,Belgium between the 24th-31st May.On Saturday,15th.June the parent association raised Â£256.51 in their Summer fair held on the school yard. The junior children visited the Butterfly World at Shrewsbury and the Acton Scott farm museum at Craven Arms on Thursday,20th.June.The school came 4th. in the inter school swimming gala at Holywell swimming pool on Tuesday, 25th.June.23 children attended Pentre- -llyncymer centre between July1st-4th. The infant sports was on Thursday,4th. July.Junior sports was held on Tuesday 9th.July.The 2 houses Glyndwr and Llywelyn shared the shield.The infant trip visited Llangollen canal and railway.The canal boat was pulled by a horse.The train was a steam train.
